summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding the creation of dummy accounts for revenue tracking. It includes a request from Andrea Tapia to Shivani Kacholia and mentions several individuals in the context of this task. The email indicates that the request has been completed.

persons.name: Shivani Kacholia
persons.context: Shivani Kacholia is the sender of the email confirming the completion of a request for dummy accounts.

persons.name: Andrea Tapia
persons.context: Andrea Tapia is the individual who requested the creation of dummy accounts for revenue tracking.

persons.name: Kimberly Hart
persons.context: Kimberly Hart is included in the CC of the email regarding the dummy accounts.

persons.name: Leslie Roth
persons.context: Leslie Roth is included in the CC of the email regarding the dummy accounts.

persons.name: Leneth Vargas
persons.context: Leneth Vargas is included in the CC of the email regarding the dummy accounts.

persons.name: Edjoy Lobo
persons.context: Edjoy Lobo is included in the CC of the email regarding the dummy accounts.

persons.name: Alexander Moradi
persons.context: Alexander Moradi is mentioned as an account holder for one of the dummy accounts.

persons.name: Alan C. Fox
persons.context: Alan C. Fox is mentioned as an account holder for one of the dummy accounts.

keyFacts: The email was sent on February 9, 2015.
Shivani Kacholia confirmed the completion of a request for dummy accounts.
The request was made by Andrea Tapia.
Several individuals were included in the CC of the email.
Two account holders, Alexander Moradi and Alan C. Fox, were mentioned in the context of dummy accounts.
